page.title: 18MOBILE LIBRARY
page.content: The Mobile Library comes to Great Easton and Duton Hill on Wednesdays. It is a yellow van with white writing saying "Essex County Library". It waits near the village hall, arriving between 3.15 _ 3.35 pm and waiting for 20 minutes.It sometimes stays there longer depending on how many people go for books. They get new books twice a month.Some people said they are very exciting books but their mums must get them while they are at school.The uniform they wear is black with their own clothes underneath. Most people said they are very friendly people because they don't rush while you are looking for books. I think it is a very good service to have in the country so that people can read books when they want.
